description: This file defines a React component 'Recommendations' for a web application's frontend. It implements a page that displays a list of recommendations fetched from an API, with filtering options based on priority. The component manages state, performs side effects with useEffect, and renders a data table with recommendations details and a filter bar.

methods.name: formatCurrency
methods.description: Formats a number into a currency string, defaults to USD, with fallback to fixed decimal if Intl.NumberFormat is unavailable.
